S

SALUTE - Static variable in class comInf.Message
Sending type for the Waiter to salute the arriving Students
SAYGOODBYE - Static variable in class comInf.Message
Sending type for the Waiter to say goodbye to the Students
ServerCom - Class in comInf
Implementation of the communication channel, server's side, for a communication based on sending/receiving messages through sockets using TCP Protocol.
ServerCom(int) - Constructor for class comInf.ServerCom
Communication channel instantiation.
ServerCom(int, ServerSocket) - Constructor for class comInf.ServerCom
Communication channel instantiation (2nd form).
serverSide - package serverSide
Server's side - Solution for the Restaurant's Problem, implementing the client-server model of type 2 (server replication) with static launching of the entities envolved.
setTimeout(int) - Method in class comInf.ServerCom
Definition of a timeout for the listening socket.
SHUTDOWN - Static variable in class comInf.Message
Return type to tell the client that the server must be shutdown
shutdown() - Method in class serverSide.GeneralRepository
Process of closing the server once it is no longer necessary.
shutdown - Static variable in class serverSide.RepoMain
 
shutdown() - Static method in class serverSide.RepoMain
Process of closing the server once it is no longer necessary.
SIGNALWAITER - Static variable in class comInf.Message
Sending type for a Student to signal the Waiter for him to prepare the bill
start() - Method in class comInf.ServerCom
Establishment of the service.
STARTEATING - Static variable in class comInf.Message
Sending type for the Students to start eating the current course
STARTPREPARATION - Static variable in class comInf.Message
Sending type for the Chef to start preparing the first course
